prompt: Create a task management app using aws

umlDiagrams.class:
classDiagram
  class Task {
    +id: int
    +title: string
    +description: string
    +dueDate: Date
    +status: string
    +assignUser(user: User): void
  }

  class User {
    +id: int
    +name: string
    +email: string
    +tasks: List~Task~
    +addTask(task: Task): void
  }

  class Project {
    +id: int
    +name: string
    +tasks: List~Task~
    +addTask(task: Task): void
  }

  Task --> User : assigned to
  Project o-- Task : contains
  User "1" --> "many" Task : manages
umlDiagrams.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
  participant User
  participant WebApp
  participant APIGateway
  participant Lambda
  participant DynamoDB

  User->>WebApp: Create Task
  WebApp->>APIGateway: Send Task Details
  APIGateway->>Lambda: Trigger Function
  Lambda->>DynamoDB: Save Task
  DynamoDB-->>Lambda: Confirmation
  Lambda-->>APIGateway: Task Created
  APIGateway-->>WebApp: Task Created
  WebApp-->>User: Task Created
umlDiagrams.component:
flowchart TB
  subgraph Frontend
    web[Web App]
  end
  subgraph Backend
    apiGateway[API Gateway]
    lambda[Lambda Function]
  end
  subgraph Storage
    dynamoDB[DynamoDB]
  end
  subgraph Monitoring
    cloudWatch[CloudWatch]
  end

  web --> apiGateway
  apiGateway --> lambda
  lambda --> dynamoDB
  lambda --> cloudWatch
umlDiagrams.architecture:
architecture-beta
  group Frontend(logos:aws-cloudfront)[Frontend]
    service webApp(logos:aws-amplify)[Web App] in Frontend
  group Backend(logos:aws-lambda)[Backend]
    service apiGateway(logos:aws-api-gateway)[API Gateway] in Backend
    service taskLambda(logos:aws-lambda)[Task Lambda] in Backend
  group Storage(logos:aws-dynamodb)[Storage]
    service taskDB(logos:aws-dynamodb)[Task Database] in Storage
  group Monitoring(logos:aws-cloudwatch)[Monitoring]
    service logging(logos:aws-cloudwatch)[CloudWatch Logging] in Monitoring

  webApp:R --> L:apiGateway
  apiGateway:L --> R:taskLambda
  taskLambda:L --> R:taskDB
  taskLambda:T --> B:logging
